mainTask.title: Linear/Vercel-Quality Landing Page Development
mainTask.description:
Surgical, one-change-at-a-time execution plan to transform Hello World into a Linear/Vercel-quality landing page while keeping the project stable. No ClientTokensProvider used in this pass—advanced tokens will be re-introduced only after the page ships and is stable.

RUN_DATE=2025-09-05T02:35:55.323Z
Total Steps: 34
Estimated Hours: 16
Phases: 5 (A, B, C, D, E)

subtasks.title: Phase A — Hard Stabilize (no visuals yet)
subtasks.description: Goal: rock-solid baseline; no runtime surprises.

actions.title: Pin and verify core versions
actions.description: In package.json, keep next@14.2.x, react@18.2.x, react-dom@18.2.x. Run npm ci.
actions.verification: npm ls react react-dom next shows single copies; npm run dev loads / with 'Hello World', console clean.

actions.title: Minimal Next config
actions.description: In next.config.*, remove custom webpack/fallbacks. Keep a bare config (images, experimental off).
actions.verification: Dev server restarts clean; / loads fine.

actions.title: Strictly server-only code separation
actions.description: Ensure any observability/logging/OpenTelemetry files import server-only and are not imported by client components.
actions.verification: Global search for @opentelemetry|winston|fs|path in app/** components/** → none.

actions.title: Disable barrels for app/landing dependencies
actions.description: In the homepage path, replace barrel imports with direct file imports. (Leave other areas for later.)
actions.verification: Build still green; / renders.

actions.title: Error boundary placement
actions.description: Use a small local error boundary only around the page content, not at the very root. (Keep layout.tsx simple.)
actions.verification: Introduce a controlled error in a child and confirm the boundary catches it without breaking the shell, then revert the error.

actions.title: Middleware still off (for now)
actions.description: Keep middleware returning NextResponse.next(); we'll re-enable near the end.
actions.verification: / renders; no edge errors.

subtasks.title: Phase B — Base Shell & Theming (simple, static)
subtasks.description: Goal: a clean shell with theme + motion, no custom token runtime.

actions.title: Inter font + base HTML
actions.description: In app/layout.tsx, add next/font/google Inter with display: 'swap', apply className to <body>.
actions.verification: Text switches to Inter; no FOUT; console clean.

actions.title: ThemeProvider (next-themes), zero JS token logic
actions.description: Wrap page with <ThemeProvider attribute="class" defaultTheme="system" enableSystem>. No custom tokens provider.
actions.verification: Toggle OS light/dark; <html class="dark"> flips; no errors.

actions.title: MotionProvider
actions.description: Add a lightweight MotionProvider (or just AnimatePresence scaffold) but no animations yet.
actions.verification: Page renders as before.

actions.title: Static CSS variables for colors/spacing/type
actions.description: In app/globals.css, define static tokens only (no context): CSS variables for colors, spacing, typography.
actions.verification: Add a test <div style={{background:'var(--bg)'}}>; colors appear.

actions.title: Tailwind hook-up (if not already)
actions.description: Ensure tailwind.config.js has content: ["./app/**/*.{ts,tsx}", "./components/**/*.{ts,tsx}"] and no plugin that injects tokens at runtime.
actions.verification: Use bg-[var(--bg)] text-[var(--fg)] classes on a test block.

subtasks.title: Phase C — Layout Primitives (reusable & pretty)
subtasks.description: Goal: production-ready Container + Grid + Section spacing you'll reuse everywhere.

actions.title: Minimal Container component
actions.description: components/ui/container.tsx (server component OK): Container with variant support and responsive padding.
actions.verification:
Replace
child with

Hello

; centered at ~1152px.

actions.title: Section rhythm helpers
actions.description: In globals.css: .section, .section-sm, .section-lg classes for consistent spacing.
actions.verification: Wrap content in <section className="section">…</section>; spacing looks right.

actions.title: 12-col Grid utility
actions.description: Create components/ui/grid.tsx with simple API: Grid and Col components.
actions.verification: Place two <Col span={6}> side-by-side.

actions.title: Surface card utility
actions.description: components/ui/surface.tsx: Surface component with Linear/Vercel-style subtle borders and backgrounds.
actions.verification: Wrap content; looks like subtle Linear/Vercel surface.

actions.title: Button primitive (for CTA later)
actions.description: Use a simple Tailwind button (accent background, rounded-xl, medium height).
actions.verification: Hover shows slight translate/opacity.

subtasks.title: Phase D — Homepage Composition (from shell → hero → sections)
subtasks.description: Goal: ship a beautiful, modern landing page with progressive polish.

actions.title: Replace 'Hello World' with Hero Section skeleton
actions.description: In app/page.tsx (server OK): Container, badge, h1, subcopy, primary + secondary buttons.
actions.verification: Visually balanced at 1280px; no overflow; mobile wraps elegantly.

actions.title: Add Hero art placeholder (no heavy assets)
actions.description: Below copy, add a Surface with height ~420px for a 'product shot' placeholder.
actions.verification: No CLS on load; image placeholder feels premium (good spacing).

actions.title: Add Features section (3-4 cards)
actions.description: <section className="section"> <Container> <Grid> <Col span={12} sm:span=6 lg:span=3>…
actions.verification: Cards wrap on mobile; equal spacing; headings align with hero grid.

actions.title: Add Social proof / logos row
actions.description: Small muted label + logo row inside Container.
actions.verification: Logos are grayscale, modest size, even spacing.

actions.title: Add CTA section at bottom
actions.description: A condensed section: headline, one sentence, primary button.
actions.verification: Good rhythm: space between hero → features → CTA consistent.

actions.title: Light/dark refinement
actions.description: Slightly lift surfaces in dark (bg-white/[0.03]) and tone down borders (/ [0.06]).
actions.verification: Dark mode looks elegant; no crushed contrast (WCAG AA).

actions.title: Typography polish
actions.description: Tighten hero leading, set subhead to max-w-prose, adjust tracking-[-0.01em] for display sizes.
actions.verification: Hero reads 'quiet, confident'; no widows on common widths.

actions.title: Interaction polish (micro-motion)
actions.description: Add subtle motion.div fade/slide for hero text (staggered 40–80ms), and button hover with scale 1.015 + shadow.
actions.verification: No layout shift; 60fps feel.

actions.title: Accessibility pass
actions.description: Ensure headings descend correctly (h1 → h2), buttons have aria-label when icon-only, focus rings visible.
actions.verification: Keyboard tab order correct; Lighthouse a11y ≥ 95.

actions.title: Performance pass
actions.description: Use next/image for any logos/screens; avoid unoptimized SVG if large; preload Inter 600 weight only if needed; keep hero art under ~120–200KB.
actions.verification: Lighthouse LCP ≤ 2.5s on fast 3G sim, CLS < 0.1.

actions.title: Meta & OG
actions.description: Fill export const metadata with title/description/OG image.
actions.verification: View source → meta present; Twitter Card Validator ok.

subtasks.title: Phase E — Safety, Hygiene & Re-enable Guards
subtasks.description: Goal: keep the beauty, regain guardrails, and prevent regressions.

actions.title: Re-enable middleware incrementally
actions.description: Turn on the first harmless header (e.g., X-DNS-Prefetch-Control: on), deploy locally.
actions.verification: Pages load; console clean. Repeat: Add one header/rule at a time.

actions.title: Sanitize imports around homepage
actions.description: Replace any lingering barrel imports used by homepage with direct file imports. Add an ESLint rule for no-barrel-imports in app/** (optional).
actions.verification: eslint . passes.

actions.title: Add a small 'no server-only in client' lint
actions.description: Create a custom ESLint rule or simple grep CI step to block fs|path|winston|@opentelemetry|server-only in components/** and client files.
actions.verification: CI fails if someone re-introduces them.

actions.title: Snapshot tests for the three homepage sections
actions.description: Jest or Vitest snapshots for hero, features, CTA (server components tested via @testing-library/react).
actions.verification: npm test passes.

actions.title: Visual regression smoke (optional)
actions.description: One Playwright test: navigate /, screenshot, compare baseline.
actions.verification: CI green.

actions.title: Document do's/don'ts (one README section)
actions.description: A small 'Homepage Guidelines' list: no barrels, no runtime token providers, design tokens via CSS variables, etc.
actions.verification: Readable in repo; devs follow it.

actions.title: (Deferred) Plan to re-introduce tokens provider safely
actions.description: Only after the page ships, move token logic to build-time (generate CSS vars) or singleton module with zero React context.
actions.verification: Replace a single token (e.g., --accent) through the new system → page updates; no runtime errors.
